sentences.en: A horizontal dislocation, as of a rock stratum, at a fault.
sentences.cn: (地质学)因断层而造成的 、 通常指侧向或水平移位.

sentences.en: A portion of bedrock or other stratum protruding through the soil level.
sentences.cn: 露出地表的一部分基岩或其他地层.

sentences.en: An aquifer is a water - bearing rock stratum such as sandstone and chalk.
sentences.cn: 地下蓄水层是一些有水的岩石层,如沙岩和白垩岩.

sentences.en: Contained within the rock strata is evidence that the region was intensely dry 15,000 years ago.
sentences.cn: 岩层中的证据表明该地区在15,000 年前曾经非常干旱。

sentences.en: Figure 1 : Stratum - relationship Character of Community Autonomy.
sentences.cn: 图 1: 社区自治的层缘特征.

sentences.en: Ginkgo biloba on the skin, the stratum corneum is obvious.
sentences.cn: 银杏叶的上表皮, 具有明显的角质层.

sentences.en: Sanding is a phenomenon that stratum sands come out with formation fluid.
sentences.cn: 出砂现象是指地层砂粒随着地层流体产出的现象.

sentences.en: That is to say, new class and the stratum categories derive alternations of political purposes.
sentences.cn: 政治目的改变, 将产生新的阶级与阶层划分.

sentences.en: The body ordinarily is constantly shedding imperceptible tiny, thin fragments of stratum corneum.
sentences.cn: 机体经常不断地脱落下细小而薄的角质层碎片,几乎无法察觉.

sentences.en: The coal is a coal resource that reserves in old stratum.
sentences.cn: 石煤是贮藏在古老地层中的一种煤炭资源.

sentences.en: The lower stratum divides again into Ds and Es.
The psychology and spirit function will be developed broadly in material stratum.
sentences.cn: 以求多层次多方位地发挥其物质功能形态上的心理和精神功能.

sentences.en: The research of seismites mostly focuses on the marine stratum before Paleozoic.
sentences.cn: 目前国内外学者对震积岩的研究主要集中在古生代以前的海相地层.

sentences.en: This is a stratum we must win over.
sentences.cn: 这一阶层,我们是必须争取的.

sentences.en: This paper presents a computing method for fast calculating rectangular foundations with weak underlying stratum.
sentences.cn: 推导出具有软弱下卧层土矩形基础的直接计算公式,编制了相应的计算机程序.

sentences.en: To displace or move a vein lode, or stratum, for example.
sentences.cn: (地层, 矿脉等)转位,滑动置换或移动(例如水脉、矿脉 、 地层等)

地层学；地层中的岩石组成

trans.tran_en: a layer of rock or earth
